products.name: Boho Sunset Dress
products.description: Flowy maxi dress in earthy sunset tones with delicate embroidery. Perfect for festival season, beach walks, and channeling free-spirited bohemian energy.

products.name: Urban Edge Leather Jacket
products.description: Bold black leather moto jacket with silver hardware. Edgy urban streetwear essential for those who command attention with confident, rebellious style.

products.name: Cozy Knit Oversized Sweater
products.description: Ultra-soft chunky knit sweater in warm cream. Oversized comfort meets hygge vibes - perfect for cozy autumn afternoons with hot cocoa and good books.

products.name: Minimalist Linen Blazer
products.description: Clean-lined natural linen blazer in oatmeal. Effortless sophistication for the modern minimalist who values timeless elegance and sustainable fabrics.

products.name: Festival Fringe Top
products.description: Bohemian crop top with cascading fringe details and geometric patterns. Festival-ready piece that brings playful, carefree vibes to any summer adventure.

products.name: Sleek Athleisure Set
products.description: High-performance joggers and sports bra set in sleek black. Technical athleisure that transitions seamlessly from intense workouts to trendy streetwear.

products.name: Vintage Denim Mom Jeans
products.description: Classic high-waisted mom jeans in authentic vintage wash. Retro 90s nostalgia meets contemporary cool - perfect for creating effortlessly stylish casual looks.

products.name: Elegant Silk Midi Dress
products.description: Luxurious champagne silk dress with elegant draping. Sophisticated evening wear that exudes timeless grace and refined femininity for special occasions.

products.name: Grunge Plaid Flannel
products.description: Oversized flannel shirt in moody plaid patterns. Authentic grunge aesthetic with laid-back attitude - perfect for those who embrace alternative, non-conformist style.

products.name: Luxe Cashmere Turtleneck
products.description: Premium cashmere turtleneck in rich burgundy. Investment piece combining cloud-like comfort with understated luxury and classic European elegance.

products.name: Sporty Track Pants
products.description: Lightweight technical track pants with side stripes. Athletic performance meets street style - ideal for active lifestyles and urban exploration.

products.name: Romantic Lace Blouse
products.description: Delicate lace blouse with Victorian-inspired details and puff sleeves. Feminine and romantic piece perfect for date nights and special brunches.

products.name: Edgy Ripped Skinny Jeans
products.description: Distressed black skinny jeans with strategic rips and frayed edges. Rock-inspired denim for those who live on the edge and embrace bold fashion statements.

products.name: Preppy Polo Shirt
products.description: Classic cotton polo in crisp navy with contrast collar. Timeless preppy style that brings sophisticated casual elegance to country clubs and yacht parties.

products.name: Artsy Asymmetric Tunic
products.description: Avant-garde tunic with asymmetric hemline and abstract print. Creative and artistic piece for those who view fashion as wearable art and self-expression.

products.name: Tropical Print Maxi Skirt
products.description: Vibrant maxi skirt with bold tropical leaf print. Resort-ready piece that brings vacation energy and exotic flair to warm-weather wardrobes.

products.name: Power Suit Blazer
products.description: Structured blazer in midnight black with sharp tailoring. Confidence-boosting power piece for boardrooms, presentations, and commanding professional presence.

products.name: Cottagecore Floral Dress
products.description: Sweet midi dress with ditsy floral print and puff sleeves. Whimsical cottagecore aesthetic perfect for garden parties and pastoral daydreams.

products.name: Tech Wear Cargo Pants
products.description: Futuristic cargo pants with multiple utility pockets and reflective details. Technical urban wear for those who blend function with cutting-edge street style.

products.name: Coastal Linen Shirt
products.description: Relaxed linen button-down in ocean blue. Breezy coastal style perfect for seaside escapes, beach clubs, and channeling effortless Mediterranean elegance.

products.name: Gothic Velvet Dress
products.description: Deep burgundy velvet dress with Victorian neckline and dramatic sleeves. Dark romantic style for those drawn to gothic elegance and mysterious allure.

products.name: Minimalist Slip Dress
products.description: Sleek satin slip dress in neutral taupe. Understated elegance and versatile minimalism - perfect foundation for layering or standalone sophistication.

products.name: Statement Puffer Jacket
products.description: Oversized puffer in bold cobalt blue with metallic finish. Eye-catching outerwear that combines warmth with high-fashion street style impact.

products.name: Bohemian Crochet Top
products.description: Handcrafted crochet top with intricate patterns and open weave. Artisanal bohemian piece that celebrates craftsmanship and free-spirited festival fashion.

products.name: Executive Wool Trousers
products.description: Tailored wool trousers in charcoal gray with clean lines. Professional essentials that bring polished refinement to corporate environments and business meetings.
